Set.name: TipbandDesiredVisibility
Set.note: Hides the touch keyboard on the taskbar

Set.name: SaveConnections
Set.note: Prevents persistent mapped drives in Explorer. Assumes scripts or GPP are used to map network drives

Set.name: Enabled
Set.note: Turns off the feature that lets apps use the advertising ID

Set.name: EnableWebContentEvaluation
Set.note: Turns on Smart Screen for apps

Set.name: SystemPaneSuggestionsEnabled
Set.note: Disables app suggestions in the Start menu

Set.name: SilentInstalledAppsEnabled
Set.note: Disables app suggestions in the Start menu

Set.name: LaunchTo
Set.note: Configures File Explorer to start on This PC

Set.name: HideFileExt
Set.note: Enables the display of file extensions in File Explorer

Set.name: SeparateProcess
Set.note: Runs File Explorer windows in different processes so that one window crash won't affect all windows

Set.name: TaskbarGlomLevel
Set.note: Configures Taskbar buttons on the primary monitor to combine when the Taskbar is full

Set.name: MMTaskbarGlomLevel
Set.note: Configures Taskbar buttons on secondary monitors to combine when the Taskbar is full

Set.name: PeopleBand
Set.note: Removes the People icon from the Taskbar

Set.name: PenWorkspaceButtonDesiredVisibility
Set.note: Removes the Pen Workspace from the Taskbar

Set.name: SearchboxTaskbarMode
Set.note: Collapses the Search box into an icon on the Taskbar

Set.name: iAppDoNotTakePDFOwnershipAtLaunchWin10
Set.note: Prevents the default file type dialog box at Adobe Acrobat Reader DC first launch

Set.name: iAppDoNotTakePDFOwnershipAtLaunchWin10
Set.note: Prevents the default file type dialog box at Adobe Acrobat Pro/Standard DC first launch

Set.name: Value
Set.note: Enables location services for Win32 applications

Set.name: Value
Set.note: Enables location services for Universal Windows Platform Apps

Set.name: MessageDuration
Set.note: Increase the timeout for new notifications - Dismiss notifications after this amount of time
